section.name: Cayenne News Archive
section.p: Cayenne 1.0.2 is available for download. It contains a number of adapter fixes, as well as support for binary primary keys. Details can be found in release notes.
Many thanks to our graphic artist Anna Drapeza who created this elegant site design! Sadly enough good artistic work is still a rare thing in the OpenSource world.

u.strong: National Hockey League Switches to Cayenne

section.p: After the initial trial of Cayenne last October, NHL switched all their public applications running at NHL.com to use Cayenne. With the help from ObjectStyle and Central Park Software the site was successfully launched to production. Currently applications receive more than 5 million hits a day.
